text: DnD sections are valid in blog listing templates, but with them not editable (for clients) as a “page” in the CMS, I’m wondering how you’re using them?

<@UNHFP62P4> listing pages are editable like a normal CMS page. Your account may not have the functionality rolled out to it just yet. For accounts that don’t have the functionality yet, it’s still a good idea to build with dnd areas in your templates because once that functionality rolls out to the account, you’ll be able to use it right away.
The rollout is ongoing, If you are interested in opting into the beta for it send me your portal id.

Gotcha. This is something we’ve run up against for quite a while so I’m psyched it’s being added. If I could add it to my dev portal that would be great. 5812392

And I’ll keep an eye out for it’s official release (I must have missed it’s beta notice).
Your account has been ungated for the feature <@UNHFP62P4> you should see it now when going to blog settings, and looking at the blog template selection area
Disappointing, but understandable. Thanks for the info <@U7SL518D6>.
<@U021H3TV338> stay tuned. We know folks want it, we just want to make sure we do a good job.
